mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER(MEM_NO, MEM_ID, MEM_PWD, MEM_NAME, MEM_BIRTH, MEM_DATE , MEM_PHONE, MEM_EMAIL, MEM_GRANT, MEM_BLACK) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(MEM_NO),0)+1 FROM MEMBER) , #{memId}, CRYPTPACK.ENCRYPT(#{memPwd},#{memId}), #{memName}, #{memBirth} , sysdate, #{memPhone}, #{memEmail}, 'U', 0)
mapper.select: select b.BA_NO as baNo, r.RP_NO rpNo, (select MEM_NAME FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId}) memName, b.BA_TYPE baType, b.BA_TITLE baTitle, TO_CHAR(b.BA_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') baDate, b.BA_COUNT baCount, r.RP_CONTENT rpContent, r.RP_DATE rpDate from reply r full outer join board b on r.MEM_NO = b.MEM_NO and r.ba_no=b.ba_no where r.MEM_NO = (select mem_no from member where mem_id = #{memId}) and (b.BA_TYPE='PRODUCT' OR b.BA_TYPE IS NULL)
